1901970.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901970
In-book reference  : Book 29, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 29, Hadith 001
1901970.text: 'Abdullah ibn Ja'far said: "The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to eat cucumbers with ripe dates.”

1901980.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901980
In-book reference  : Book 29, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 29, Hadith 002
1901980.text: 'A’isha said: (may Allah be well pleased with her): "The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to eat watermelon with ripe dates.”

1901990.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901990
In-book reference  : Book 29, Hadith 003
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 29, Hadith 003
1901990.text: Anas ibn Malik said: "I saw Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) combine watermelon and ripe dates.”

1902000.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1902000
In-book reference  : Book 29, Hadith 004
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 29, Hadith 004
1902000.text: A’isha(may Allah be well pleased with her) said: “The Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) ate watermelon with ripe dates.”

1902010.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1902010
In-book reference  : Book 29, Hadith 005
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 29, Hadith 005
1902010.text: Abu Huraira said: “When the people saw the first fruit [of the season], they used to bring it to Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace), and when he received it, Allah’s Messenger would say (Allah bless him and give him peace): ‘O Allah, grant us blessing in our fruits, grant us blessing in our city, and grant us blessing in our measure of grain and our bushel! O Allah, Abraham is Your servant. Your Bosom Friend [Khalil] and Your Prophet, and I am Your servant and Your Prophet. He supplicated You on behalf of Mecca, and I supplicate You on behalf of Medina, for the like of what he supplicated You for on behalf of Mecca, and the like thereof as well!’ Then he would summon the youngest child he saw and give him that fruit.”

1902020.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1902020
In-book reference  : Book 29, Hadith 006
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 29, Hadith 006
1902020.text: Ar-Rubai bint Mu'awwidh ibn 'Afra’ said: "Mu'adh ibn 'Afra sent me with a tray of ripe dates, and on it there were pieces of fluffy cucumber. He [the Prophet] (Allah bless him and give him peace) used to love cucumbers, so I brought them to him. He had with him some ornaments that had come to him from Bahrain, so he took a handful of them and gave it to me."

1902030.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1902030
In-book reference  : Book 29, Hadith 007
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 29, Hadith 007
1902030.text: Ar-Rubai bint Mu'awwidh ibn 'Afra said: "I brought the Prophet (Allah bless him and give him peace) a tray of ripe dates and fluffy cucumber, so he gave me a handful of ornaments, or she said: of gold.”
